name: Ill.Gates
description: '''Dylan Lane''' (born October 8, 1982), professionally known as '''ill.Gates''', is a Canadian [[electronic music]] [[Music Producer|producer]], [[Disc jockey|DJ]], and educator known for his contributions to the [[dubstep]] and [[bass music]] genres, and has garnered acclaim for his innovative musical approach, collaborations with notable artists, and efforts to share electronic music production knowledge within the community.
